content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were travelling home together at approximately 5:30 p.M from willimantic, ct to our home in lebanon, ct. as we entered the block to our subdivision, heading north, a very large, very bright green object, like a fireball, caught my eye out of the front windshield in the eastern/northeastern sky. the colors were such that i immediately thought a large firework nearby. but given the winter scene, and lack of noise, i mentally ruled that out and pointed it out to my husband, who was driving the vehicle. i saw the object for about 2-3 seconds longer than my husband.

it streaked across the sky emitting, what can only be described as sparks. my husband's first thought was, "plane crash." but then, as a reference we both noted an obvious commercial plane in the sky and quickly ruled that out as the sheer size and bright green, bluish color looked nothing like the fiery orange you would expect if it were a plan exploding. also, given the fact that this streaked in a straight-line trajectory it didn't seem like any fireworks we know nor an object that was falling to the ground. it was going sideways in the eastern sky.

we didn't note it fade out or fall, as the bright green quickly became obscured by some cloud cover in the low sky.

the time of day was dusk and so it was still a dusk-like sky with some light. so the falling/shooting stars we routinely see at night looked nothing like this. it was the green color and sparks that really left us talking.  

what is this thing? were there any atmospheric phenomenon or routine meteor showers on this date?
content.summary: Bright, very large green object travelling in a trajectory like a meteor in the eastern sky

content.detailedDescription: I think i may have seen a ufo! my wife and i first noticed the odd light just before thanksgiving 2013 after we moved into our new house in a community behind pocahontas state park in chesterfield county, va. we would see the light only in the early evening. it was always in the northwest (i checked with a good quality compass).  at first i thought it must be a planet because it was so bright and we only would see it in the early evening.  initially i saw no other lights other than the single orange light that would become brighter and flicker.  however, unlike a planet the light was not high in the sky, it was above the tree line, and the light was really odd.  then one night on or about january 3, 2014 i was lying in bed just staring at the light and it began to pulsate and grow brighter. then it split and became three orange lights with each light being at the end of a triangle.  the lights were in the same spot as always, the northwest.  they didn't move across the sky.  the lights pulsated in a clockwise manner for a few seconds and then changed direction for a second to counterclockwise.  planets don't do that!  i could hear no noise.  then the three orange-glowing spheres just disappeared.  i was just sort of stunned and excited after seeing the event.  it's been about two weeks now and i haven't seen them since.
content.summary: Husband and wife observe strange silent orange-glowing ufo light on multiple nights, then at bedtime husband sees 1 sphere above treeline split into 3 orange ufo spheres that rotate clockwise and counterclockwise and form triangle before disappearing.

content.detailedDescription: Myself and 3 friends were stargazing n.W of normal, il. looking east. summer of 95 or 96.  we noticed a "star" dropping in elevation until just above horizon. next it started moving towards us until eventually coming very close to the car. appx. 50-100 feet into field from road and 25-50 feet in air. no sound from object and flight path was from east to west. object remained at constant brightness level. size of object was similar to a large car or truck once past us it picked up speed until out of sight. estimate: moving 30mph until even with us and then faster after it past us. felling a bit nervous after we headed home right away. multiple sightings on multiple occasions in the sky but only this one time did we get the flyby. gave phone interview with mufon today as well.
content.summary: Close encounter of 1st kind

content.detailedDescription:
About a year and a half ago, i was leaving wal mart. walking thru the parking lot to my car. as i got closer to my car i looked up and saw a very unusual sight. i saw a v shaped wake of fire cutting thru the night sky. i saw no object per se, no source, but it appeared that something unseen was cutting thru the sky and leaving a wake of flames around it. it was very strange, and i looked around to see if anyone else was around to witness this, but unfortunately no one was around. the best description i can give is to imagine the v shaped wake that starts forming at the front of a boat cutting thru water, but instead it was flames. strangely it appeared to be in the same flight path, and altitude (500ft-1000ft as the small planes that fly in and out of a local air field (gillespie field) approximately 5 miles away. but i've never seen a plane exhibit any of these features. once i saw it i watched it for around 20-30 seconds and it disappeared, only to reappear a couple of seconds later. then it disappeared again, reappeared for a few seconds in the same trajectory and finally vanished for good. as it would reappear the flames seemed to be back at their full length, as if they didn't emerge from a source and get longer. there were no blinking lights of any kind, or any constant lights at all. no plane crashes were reported either. i drove back home which was relatively in the same general direction the object was traveling, and kept looking at the sky to see if it would re-emerge. it never did though. i can't think of any plane that would do this. the flames around the object appeared to be quite long relative to the elevation. i would estimate 50-100 feet and fairly robust. the graphic included is very rudimentary but shows the basic shape.

i tried to submit this report last night, but was having network issues. sorry if you got a double submission.
content.summary: Wake of flames. flew in small planes flight path and flickered out. disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Apenas estoy entendiendo ingles, vivo en per���, tacna, ciudad pocollay(alejado a la ciudad).. donde vivo maaas alla hay cerros...Y yo estoy en mi segundo piso de mi casa.. tengo una ventana que se `puede mirar hacia los cerros.. donde esta mi computadora esta la puerta y tbn la ventana, estaba averiguando pasando tiempo en internet y vi una luz blanca pero bien chiquita una bolita q nose puede percibir a la primera visata.. luego parpadeaba ... eso fue a las 6 : 40 pm..A las 7:20 a esa hora vi una luz roja grandecita q se movia y dejando una cola chica, a lado avia una bolita blanca un poco peque���a q la otra, la roja si fue vistosa, lo mas raro q la bolita blanca desaparecio y la roja se volvio chiquita hasta volver blanca, se estaba volviendo mas chiquito hasta q parpadeaba y desapareci���..Ahorita estoy escribiendo y a cada rato volteo la cabeza aver si aparece algo.. yo soy de una persona de mente abierta ..Se que existe otros sere vivo en este universo sin fin..Lo que no puedo asegurar es si todo lo q dicen sea cierto de que nos vienen a visitar.. lo que me parece extra���o es q muchas noches hablo sola cuando duermo , he averiguado y (sigo viendo los punstos , ahorita mismo el rojo esta   ...Es raro se junto las dos ..Aparecio de color amarrillo se movia a la izquierda y desaparecio, esestupendo pero a la vez da miedo).. bueno como seguia diciendo q hablar en las noches mientras duermes.. es consecuencia a la estres y muchos factores..Pero  lo mio es raro pues hablo muy frecuente..Y aveces pienso(locura mia) q me quizas esten estudiando..Se q no soy la unica persona.. pero podria ser..Aunque sea una idea totalmente ridicula,
ese punto rojo hace 3 semanas (no recueerdo bn) tbn vi ese punto rojo en los cerros.. pero no le di importancia.. espero q me respondan.. gracias
tengo practicamente 20 a���os, soy universitaria. 
(al parecer no puedo subir la informacion se requiere mas informaci���n.. no se mucho el ingles..Asi que lo llenare por llenar..Me van a disculpar.
content.summary: Es relativamente asombroso

content.detailedDescription:
I witnessed a triangle of three lights moving from n.W to n.E. direction
then it split up in different directions returning into a circle,no sound
was observed at about 1000 feet.
content.summary: A triangle then split into a circle

content.detailedDescription: I was travelling between melbourne & sydney overnight by train.I was woken up at approx 1.30am to 2.00am by a loud voice telling me to wake up repeatedly.As i was lying there in bed i could still hear what sounded like a voice yelling wake up.There was the usual train noises but something really scared me about what i was hearing.I got up and tried to work out where this voice was coming from.I checked the radio in the cabin,i put my ear up to the walls but nothing.I opened the cabin door but there was no one in the cabins beside me on either sides by this time i was really getting scared so got my mobile phone l lied back on my bed and recorded 2 recordings approx 10 min long of what i was hearing the recordings didn't really describe what i was hearing but i had to try and record it anyway,i really didn't think any body would believe me.I have no way of cleaning up these recordings but some of the sqeeks and rattles were the train and some of it is a language talking words like contact comes up sentences stating that i am being taught and sometimes a dialect i carnot understand.All i know is at times the voice gets angry like he is trying to push a point.As i got of the train the next morning the family 2 cabins down looked really spooked.All i could say to them is i think the train is spooked.I put the recordings on my computer when i got home and these are the recordings attached.They cane be played on quick time player.I will never forget how scared i was listening to this that night and thought you might have a way of cleaning the recording as i don't now how.
content.summary: I recorded a strange voice in 2 recordings on my mobile phone.The voice woke me from sleep..

content.detailedDescription: Driving from las cures new mexico late in the evening and took  a photo of something that got my eye
content.summary: las cures new mexico to el paso

content.detailedDescription:
Around noon one day in mid august 1969, i was having trouble with my television signal. while adjusting the rabbit ears, i noticed that the front yard went dark with a shadow, and that the shadow clearly had a rounded edge to it. this surprised me, so i peeked out of the front door and saw a huge round object moving south, slowly. after a moment, it had disappeared over the tree line, and the television signal returned. few moments later, it happened again. this time i ran to the kitchen to grab my mother's camera, which she kept atop the fridge. i then ran back to the front door, and saw that it was moving north. so i had to run back through the house to the back door for a northward view. as i ran out of the back door, i landed on the last of three steps so hard that it broke in two and i fell on my knees. it was there long enough for me to snap three photos with a kodak 135. only one of the three developed, the first, which only caught about two-thirds of the object. the other two were blank but for a small white light. as i knelt there, i encountered a bone crushing vibrational sound, a sonic disruptive force, that made me feel ill and fatigued for a few hours. the object finally disappeared over the trees to the north-northwest.

the original photograph was given to author and investigator george d. fawcett. the only copy i have is from a magazine article, and has my age and time wrong.[i was eleven years old at the time]
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Disc shaped object interfered with television signal

content.detailedDescription:
While on a western roadtrip in august, 1995, i visited a very remote valley somewhere in the vicinity of mt. princeton, co.  the valley was only accessible by dirt road and there were no other people anywhere to be found.

i snapped a couple of dozen photos with a canon point and shoot 35mm film camera.  some time later, i noticed a yellow cylindrical object with a purple tail, in the attached picture, hovering above the valley.  

at the time, i only had the print and the negative, and the object was too small to scrutinize.  i just figured it was just a photographic anomaly and gave it no further thought.

just today, i found the picture while going through some old stuff.  i noticed the object and decided to scan it into a digital file for closer inspection.  it definitely appears to be an object hovering over the valley with no explanation of how it could be there. 

there is still probably some simple explanation as to what it is, but i thought i would submit it to you to see if it fits any past photos or observations.  

again, there were no other people, and certainly no aircraft in this very remote and inaccessible valley. in addition, it did not appear in any of the other 20 or so pictures i took of the valley.  the picture has faded a bit over time, but can be enhanced with the appropriate software to view it in more detail.  the attached picture is an untouched scan of the original print. please let me know if you think this is truly a u.F.O., or just an explainable phenomenon.

thank you.
content.summary: Yellow cyndrical object with purple tail appeared in picture in remote empty valley.

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 530 in the evening when i went to my kitchen to prepare eight bowl of soup.

it had already gotten dark and my lights were off in the kitchen so i turned on a light above the sink and went to the stove with a pop full of soup and put it on

my blinds in the kitchen window that faces south were open and i was drawn to this stationary light just standing there it looks so out of place before it abruptly moved eastward and then abruptly return to its position it was in

i made a short video of it that is not very detailed which i can send you

i called my son and told him to look in the southwest sky from his neighborhood and he could not see anything

i could not zoom in close enough with my iphone camera to get a clearer picture so i ran into my living room and came back with a pair of olympus binocular's.  i held my iphone up to the binocular's and painstakingly snapped three images of the light through my blinds which much to my astonishment looked saucer shaped.

i walked out to the back porch and there was no sound none whatsoever but this object was right in the night sky

at one point you could see below with an further south and airliner heading east from midway airport.

i am not one to freak out about things but i can assure you whatever this waws was totally out of place and i thought to myself what better time to observe then in the middle of rush hour when nobody looks up

i am convinced this was not an earthly craft jicha the way it hovered silently the way it moved quickly and the way it moved at a snails pace perfectly's level and quiet towards the west until i could not see it anymore
content.summary: Ufo in sw sky over chicago. hovered with no sound before heading west slowly until gone

content.detailedDescription: This is to update my report number 51193 i had said it was the summer of 1973 but it was in the summer of 1975.  i would still like to find sum one that was there.  les.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Cone .Yellow orange light lower side

content.detailedDescription: There i was, sitting in my living room with the front blinds open, when the wife said,"do you see these? i just saw 2 of these orange lights go over and there's 2 more". we went out in the driveway to get a better look at them when 2 more came frome the south on the same course, then 3, then 3 more. we knew they weren't planes, or drones, or chinese lanterns. all did the same course at the same steady speed and appearred to be over the river. no sound, no vertical change in course, and no flickering. it lasted about 15 minutes. amazing, exiting, and probably a once in a lifetime event.
content.summary: Watched 2/ within seconds 2 more then 3 then 3 more orange lights moving horizontally from south to north then appearred to head east.

content.detailedDescription:
I must apologize in advance for any run-on sentences in this report as the comma key on my laptop is broken.

i was inside the house i lived in at the time in the basement using the computer.  i came upstairs to the kitchen to get a drink at approximately 8:30 pm and while i was doing that i looked out the large kitchen window and noticed the light.  it was significantly brighter than anything i'd seen in the sky before so i went outside to get a better look at it.  i wasn't really sure what to make of it.  it seemed to be pulsating or flickering like a candle flame.  when i came back in i pointed it out to my parents and my sister.  they all thought it was odd and none of them had seen it before either.  however they didn't make anything of it and went back to what they were doing.  i continued observing it for a few minutes more and it seemed to be moving albeit very slowly from left to right in my field of vision. shortly thereafter the light seemed to flicker out.  i then went back downstairs and continued using the computer.  

approximately one hour later at roughly 9:30 pm i came back upstairs and out of curiosity i looked out the kitchen window again and the light was back in the same spot i had originally seen it.  i remarked to my parents who were nearby that the light was back and my father who is somewhat skeptical of such things said "maybe it's a construction light of some kind or something".  i grabbed my digital camera and went back outside to try and get some pictures of it however i wasn't able to keep my hands steady and they were all terribly motion-blurred.  i then struck upon the idea of balancing the camera on the windowsill outside the kitchen and was able to successfully get some photographs.  at this point with the object still in sight i decided to walk to the end of my road (approx. 1km away) to see if i could get a better angle on the light.  while walking down there i lost sight of the light and when i got to the end of the road i was not able to locate it so i returned home.

roughly an hour later again at 10:30 pm i sighted the object a third time in the same area as the first two sightings.  i took my camera outside again and this time tried to get a video of it.  the batteries in the camera were dying and the camera refused to record for more than 10 seconds or so.  i ran back inside and changed the batteries and was then able to successfully record the light however i was only able to capture it for approximately 90 seconds before it went out/disappeared.  upon coming back in from filming my father said to me "if it comes back again we'll take the car and go see if we can find it".  i was awake until about 2 am but i did not see the light again that night.
content.summary: Bright unknown light seen near brighton ontario.

content.detailedDescription: Was driving back from wichita ks headed east on hwy 400 just west of fredonia ks. my wife was asleep passenger side. the sky was clear, when suddenly i saw bright lights south of my location quite high in the sky. i suddenly hollered at my wife too look and she did, and exclaimed wow! i then slowed down, realizing their was no traffic near me, and then it flashed again with 7 bright lights. ihave been on high alert because of incoming meteor showers as a result of comet ison. i then suddenly told my wife their was a meteor shower, then i realized they werent streaking across the sky. they was stationary. i had too go take a whiz anyway so i pulled over, and looked in the direction of the (at this time i realized it was a craft of some sort),craft.Suddenly it lit up again, and stayed lit up for about 4 seconds.Then it went dark, when suddenly a second craft lit up to the side of it alittle lower with the exact same light configuration, then it went dark and the origonal one re-lit for lack of a better term. i was tremendously excited at the time and dont know why. i was terribly saddened because the trip was a sad one over a death in the family, but for some reason i was elated! i am a navy veteran, and was trained too spot objects. this totally freaked me out, and i really wanted to go to it for some strange reason, but i had too get home. my wife is handicapped and was saddened over the death of her brother. i just wanted to get her home, but i really wanted to go towards the lights which out here in rural kansas wouldve meant driving over pasture ground. at first glance of the lights i thought the object was in the upper atmosphere because i was expecting seeing meteors, and i guess my mind was prepared for that. its weird for me though, my first thought at seeing the first object, was that it was high in the atmosphere, but i shouldve realized  it couldnt have been. i waited for the lights to reappear but they didnt. i found myself looking back to the west as i went east repeatedly even though not safe to do so at high speeds. the lights of the object were mostly yellow but the middle lights were whitish. it appeared to have sides where the otherlights were so it had a slight hexagon shape i would guess. btw if this is the same lights ive heard about from my mother shes been seeing them for some time. she lives over 14 miles from them. she told me about them about a week ago, and said they go up about 500 feet or so light up good then go back down. this is a regular occurance according to her. i know pretty dang close where they appear then. i dont know if its a new plane of the government or not but i felt elated at the time of the event, and got depressed afterwords, dont know why.My wife said they was stationary
content.summary: Driving back from wichita ks suddenly saw huge lights to the s.Then another sighting.

content.detailedDescription: While on hilltop near pinebush ny  4 of us were there looking for u f os . we saw an object come from southeast looked like a rocket  werent sure. the object seemed to follow the curvature of earth ,as it rose up to almoest directly east we saw another object moving very fast towards the rocket object. suddenly ther was a flash of red light maybe an inch wide to us, towards the rocket object.The other object suddenly stopped and changed direction, like a 90 degree  right. we were so amazed when this happened that we lost sight of both objects.  after watching nasa un explained files i realized thats what we saw from the ground an apparent  starwars test by the u s . after leaving the hilltop my friend turned back and said he saw white light shine on the hilltop for only a second or two. i did not see it myself
content.summary: 2 objects going towards each other in space and red flash near both objects

content.detailedDescription:
Traveling eastbound on harney lane above the town of lock ford 4 bright star like lights about 1500 to 1000 ft moving eastward out of sight. i have two friends whom saw the same thing on sunday the 12th of jan they thought it was the big dipper then it moved just before sundown.
today i saw it four star like lights about 4:40. they move eastward out of line of sight. my reaction is
almost matter of fact, i have footage in july of a small craft these were big.I know about the sighting in the 1800's in the stockton record which was the premise for cowboy and aliens, these things were
 big white lights.
content.summary: Traveling east on barney lane to turn on to jacktone rd.  i could see 4 bright star like lights above lock ford  ca . they move off  eastward.

content.detailedDescription: Went to dinner at 6:15 pm on 1/16/2014 got back around 8 pm went to use bathroom and unbuckled my belt and then went to living room just like that belt undone jeans unzipped but everything on no nudity then woke up at 10:15pm and somehow fell asleep or lost time because the phone rang and at that point i zipped my pants and then when i tried to buckle my belt it would not work or happen because the buckle was somehow flipped around it is one of those reverse belts one that is black on one side and brown on the other the buckle is on a center pin spring pin so if you want to you can pull on it flip it then wear the belt the other other color i have no memory of any abduction or visitation this report may not be much but i think it matters and may have something to do with the huge triangle ufo tree top level above me then chased by 1 fighter jet i previously reported that to mufon after that report they sent me a message i heard a loud chopper coming close ran outside to see wtf was up and this black helicopter flies right up and the pilot is the best because he just kept it there 50 foot from me i saw that it was blinged out wit a stupid white large round department of bull crap logo on the side doors so much for solid black heli's anymore. it spun around and when back. sending me a message to keep my mouth shut after reporting huge triangle with lights on each corner to mufon.
content.summary: I may have been abducted or visited

content.detailedDescription:
Due to time restraints, all reading this will have to wait to read entire moment (4 hours). i report this however hoping that others who may have seen what i saw will also report what they possibly saw.

one of the most amazing 4 hours of my life. and yes... this time i've photos. however, the most amazing moment was not captured on 'photo' :(

all happened too darned fast at times.... and just as cam/telescope was brought to the windows.... well, it disappeared and moved on me.

this thing hovered for over 4 hours which i could witness over my building. this thing also seemed (and i do not prefer to use this word, but have none other) ---- to cloak itself. it moved 'here and there', went out of my initial view and not until i ventured onto the roof of my building did it them 'reappear'.

i will "add" to this witness moment in the next few days or so.
this really was something that not one single soul could ever "peeshaw" what i saw!! take a look at the photos that i included. the little white dots were birds much closer to my viewing than the 'thing' itself. but i would like to think that the photos of the 'thing itself' might leave absolutely no room for those saying helicopters or the like of.....

i will be back to report in full detail.... i've a trip planned for tomorrow and must start to pack :(

i know what i saw (again)!!!!!!
please, someone in the area might have also seen this??
this was not an "in your face" sighting..... one must have had to notice the above-ongoings-in-the-sky to have seen this!

....Hope the pics help. 
and, yes, i will be back to delicately report all in detail :)
content.summary: 2ndtimeseeing.This!!Samelocation.Shinyobjecthovering&movingallovertheplace.Justasamazingasbefore!!!!

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home after work and noticed a bright orange sphere ball heading from east to west. it looked like a fireball. i thought it was an aeroplane at first but i could see another plane flying in the sky so it definately was not the type of lights you would see on a normal plane flying across the sky. the color was so bright i had to stop my car before turning into a road to take a picture, unfortunately thete was traffic behind me so couldnt stop much longer. i was almost in shock as iv never seen anything like it before. iv come home to google similar sightings and came across this site so thought i share this.
content.summary: A bright orange fireball rushing through the skies...

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my house garden relaxing and meditating when i noticed the light, first it looked like a comercial airplane but then i noticed it was moving in a strangely slow velocity. when it reached a certain point near a cloud next to the moon, it hovered very still for 5 min, then its light stopped or disappeared and i didn't see it anymore. i was completely frozen.
content.summary: Flying object with a pulsing light, very slow moving up to a certain point where it remained hovering for 5 min aprox.

content.detailedDescription: Out in my backyard to let the dogs out, and i was teasing my son and then i saw the object, i pointed to it and asked my son if he could see it, he said yes and i teased him that it was probably a ufo with aliens in it. he laughed but we noticed it did not move like a airplane nor did it have the lighting of a plane, it was solid white. we both thought it was a airplane at first and i asked him what he thought it was, he said he could not tell we watched it for about 30 seconds more and then it just blinked out, i grabbed his hand and he said he was scared and he was shaking. i got a little nervous, then we noticed a couple of airplanes so we watched them to see what they were going to do, but they did not seem to noticed the object. my son said he wanted to go in so i took him and the dogs in. told my wife what we saw. i was in the military for 10 years and worked around aircraft all types, fighters, training aircraft, and saw them eject chaff and flare several times, this was nothing like that. nor was it a chinese lantern. i do not know what it was, but id like to know. the object just disappeared. wierd. my son said he saw a red and a blue dot right after it disappeared, however i did not see them. we could see jupiter, pleades, and several other stars, however this was not a star, nor was it a meteorite or meteor. first time i have ever seen this type of object. i do live right near a afb, less than three miles away, they normally have c-130's and tdy planes, i also live less than 10 miles from melbourne internatioal airport and we often see cargo and smaller passenger planes. thank you for your time. any further questions and you have my contact info.
content.summary: White orb like object, saw with my son then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i were up the chetco river shooting rifles.. it was dark bout 10 at night.. we were far up in the woods on logging roads..We were on our way back into town and still had like a 45 min drive out of the woods.. we stopped off the side of the road so we could both take a piss.. we were standing back to back bout 15 feet apart i turned around and told him i had a weird feeling.. he told me that he had that same feeling and was about to say something about it too.. we get bac in the jeep and start driving, about 5 minutes later i look up in the sky right above the tree tops i seem a white orb shaped like a football, i went to point and realized my brother whole was driving had seen it at the same exact time as me.. no sooner then i could point at it and say look! it dropped out of the sky so fast... we were up in the mountains when it dropped down it went down in to the bottom of the mountain ravenes.. i right away knew what i had seen, it was way bigger then a star and way brighter and u could tell it was close in the sky but still kinda far away.. i was scared out of my mind and so was my brother, we took off and started home again but driving faster this time.. about 15 minutes down the road we both look up again.. this time we seen the ufo flying behind the trees flowing with us.. that's when i got really scared i didn't kno what to do, but as fast as it came it was gone again..After we got down the mountain and onto payment we stopped the jeep again so my brother could pee again.. that's when i noticed that the whole jeep was radiating heat off all over the whole thing it was crazy and it was a cool night so there should be no reason for it being warm all over like that.. after that night i knew that ufos were real and ppl have been seeing them for a long damn time..
content.summary: My bro and i seem it at the same time and as soon as we looked at it the football shaped orb dropped out the sky, then followed us

content.detailedDescription: Still hope to visit this sight so can not answer description other than appears to be the same ship as one witnessed by 263 in i believe the fifties only that was off the wing, horizontal and with cloaking devise with creates clouds but matching the speed of the plane made it appear as no more than a glowing cigar. vertically the bottom fifteen percent looked like the nose cone of a boeing 747 crossed with the front of a mack truck all in polished aluminum. the top eighty five percent where flames which were clearly such that they could only have been shooting down and out wards from the craft. when it first appeared at the top of my windshield i thought it was a nuclear bomb or falling sattlelite. then a burning jet with no wings or tail. then that it was so clear that it would crash just in front of me except it disappeared over the low mountain. this happen during the first four seconds after the sun came up and no sign of crash rose in or behind that mountain. if i had pulled over to mark the exact direction or line of sight i would have woken my family as we were headed to disneyland.
content.summary: Roughly size of aircraft carrier,400ft,x 2000ft.High landing vertical from space to just behind foothills which were about twice its hight. the speed must have dropped from thousands to one hundred mph in a mater of seconds in order to have viewed in 4sec

content.detailedDescription: Standing on porch new years eve.Looking to the n.W..Large red dick with yellow star inside.They slowly rose up from the horizon slowly moved to the west grew very small into a small white dot and shot out of site at impossible speed.The first 5 did this pattern about 2 min apart.Then the final 3 all came up together all following the exact same trajectory.I retrieved my binoculars to view the final three and that is how i was able to discern the yellow star pattern on the face of the dick inside the circle.
content.summary: Large red disk with yellow star inside of object.

content.detailedDescription: Driving through dublin on 680.  my wife and i both saw three lights.  she only saw the lights for a moment because she was driving and traffic was fairly heavy (there's no way we could have been the only ones to see it).  at first the lights were horizontal just as any plane viewed from the side.  it began to rotate side over side in place.  i didn't see an actual craft because it was too dark out at the time but the lights stayed in perfect distance from each other the entire time.  hovering with no directional motion.  the three lights were white and stayed on the entire time.  no pulsating or flashing and no other lights of any color appeared.  i took video of it on my phone that lasted probably about thirty or forty seconds.  when i went to show the video to my wife it was no longer there (not the first time my phone has not saved video or photo though).  it was huge.  it was much, much larger than the buildings under it and was very low.  this was near an airport and there were several planes in view at the time.
content.summary: Witnessed a triangle over dublin ca.

content.detailedDescription: In 1986 i went to the va medical center in tampa fla. they asked me how i got the metal in my finger. i said i don't have any metal in my finger. there is no scar it is just below the skin dark in color 1/8 in thick i never have had an injury to my hand that would explain this
content.summary: Metal in my finger didnt know it was there

content.detailedDescription:
Iwas working at our store and went out to get some cloths out of the car when
i looked up and saw star like globes and thought that is strange because i've
never seen any constalations with 5 diagonal stars before.

it was approx 8:30 pm est in the middle of july 2013.

i was not sure what it could be just thought it strange that i'd not seen that group of stars before.

about 1 min after i began to study the objects it was as if they knew that
they were being watched and then 2 of the objects began spinning to the right
and 1 to the left they took on a pinwheel apperance with alternating red and
white stripes like some type engine.

i felt like did my eyes just see what they saw or was it a figment of my
imagination disbelife and awe.

then in an instant they were gone in a heavenly direction.
content.summary: I observed 5 stars in a diagonal line and then three of the stars moved

content.detailedDescription: My two girls came in the house one of them actually was so scared she fell in the house, and told me the ufo was back and this time it was over the park hills and it was red glowing and they could actually see the shape of it and it was oval shape, red pulsing, but this time it made 3 loud like bang sounds and the sound actually echoed then it moved then it paced in a straight line twice then it vanished. i was in but house and i had my tv on and i never get interruptions unknown to me that it was out there i kept losing satellite service and there were no storms no clouds nothing. and about 20 minutes after we had static on our tv i have never ever had static before on my tv, it is a new tv.And the static happened at least 3xs.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: My 2 girls saw this thing again, but this time it was closer and made sounds.

content.detailedDescription:
It was night time around 11:20 pm and i was driving west on hwy 40 heading for las vegas, nevada.  i was between the towns of tucumcari and santa rosa, new mexico.  all of a sudden i saw three streaks of red lights streak across the window of my pick-up truck.  at first i thought an aircraft was crashing in front of me on the highway. suddenly it was in front of my truck maybe a thousand feet and about two hundred feet above the highway.  the craft stretched all the way across east and west highway lanes making it longer than 300 feet in width.  as i drove west on the highway it traveled with me for about three minutes.  i slowed my vehicle down and it kept the same distance from me.  finally, it drifted south off the highway at a very slow speed.  i watched it drift over the horizon with a beam of light shining down on the ground.  it seemed to float in the air.
the craft was circular saucer with five red domes underneath it.  the silver or aluminium bottom was illuminated.  one of the five red domes was in the center of the bottom and the other four equally spaced around it.  the top of craft was completely black.  there was a black super structure as it blocked out the stars above it.  i rolled my window down and i heard no engine noise coming from the craft or saw any exhaust from it.
i realize it has been twenty three years since i saw the object, i still remember every second of the event as if it happened yesterday.  due to its immense size, it could have been an experimental craft filled with hydrogen or helium with a light carbon fiber structure.  i say this because i felt as if the craft performed military maneuver in front of me as it aligned itself to match my speed on the highway.
content.summary: Object had five small red domes underneath a silver or aluminium bottom.  it dove in from the north and aliened itself with my vehicle on hwy 40 and traveled with me going west.
